response.overview: The Wanderer, an alcoholic vagabond, has his peace of mind shattered when the soothing sound of his swirling liquor can no longer be heard. He embarks on a mental and physical hunt. But, after hitting a wall, The Sticker offers to guide him until The Mob Leader vigorously obstructs their path. Now, The Wanderer must fight two battles.
response.tagline: When a vagabonding alcoholicâ€™s flask empties, he is forced to embark on a turbulent journey in search for a refill.
response.title: Rest Assured
